# Remove animation and keep ascii art (2025-11-14 14:57Z)

_**User (2025-11-14 14:57Z)**_

@init.ts 



hey there, can you remove this animation now, just leave the ascii art

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-sonnet-thinking, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user wants me to remove the animation from the banner in `init.ts` but keep the ASCII art. Looking at the code, I can see:

1. There's an animated banner function `showAnimatedBanner()` that creates an animation with:
   - Rainbow colors cycling
   - Superman art that moves up and down
   - "SUPER" and "AGENTS" text with cycling colors
   - Multiple frames (18 frames)

2. The user wants to remove the animation but keep the ASCII art

So I need to:
- Replace the animated version with a static version
- Keep the Superman art and the "SUPER" and "AGENTS" text
- Remove the animation logic (intervals, color cycling, flying offset, etc.)
- Just display it once statically

Let me simplify the `showAnimatedBanner()` function to just display the ASCII art once without any animation.</details></think>

---

I'll simplify the banner to show the ASCII art statically without any animation.

```diff
-     // Add spacing between Superman and text
-     line += &quot;  &quot;;
- 
-     // Push text down by 2 lines
-     const textLineIndex = i - 2;
- 
-     // Add SUPER text (starting at line 2)
-     if (textLineIndex &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; textLineIndex &lt; superArt.length) {
-       line += purple(superArt[textLineIndex]);
-     }
-     // Add empty line between SUPER and AGENTS
-     else if (textLineIndex === superArt.length) {
-       // Just spacing, no text
-     }
-     // Add AGENTS text
-     else if (textLineIndex &gt; superArt.length &amp;&amp; textLineIndex - superArt.length - 1 &lt; agentsArt.length) {
-       const agentsLineIndex = textLineIndex - superArt.length - 1;
-       line += purple(agentsArt[agentsLineIndex]);
-     }
- 
-     console.log(line);
-   }
+   // Display Better
+   betterArt.forEach(line =&gt; console.log(purple(line)));
+   
+   console.log(); // Empty line between Better and Agents
+   
+   // Display Agents
+   agentsArt.forEach(line =&gt; console.log(purple(line)));
  
    console.log(); // Empty line at bottom
```
